label: Separate and complete volume submissions
quote: separate and complete so that evaluation of one volume may be accomplished independently from evaluation of the other volumes.

label: Technical Approach slide limit and format
quote: 25 MS PowerPoint (PP) Slides of content (single sided)

label: Management included in Technical Approach slide limit
quote: Included in the 25 PP slide limit above

label: Past Experience page limit and format
quote: Six pages (submitted separate from the PowerPoint slide)

label: Electronic submission method
quote: Electronic submissions shall be submitted via electronic mail to Richard Kirby Contracting Specialist at richard.m.kirby@cbp.dhs.gov.

label: Oral Presentation slides format
quote: Oral Presentation slides shall be delivered in Microsoft® PowerPoint  2013 (or higher versions when available) for Oral Presentation Material.

label: Excel Pricing Spreadsheet format
quote: Excel Pricing Spreadsheet submissions must be delivered in Microsoft® Excel 2013 (or higher versions when available) for spreadsheet submissions.

label: PDF submission restriction
quote: Quoters shall not submit PDF documents, with the exception of the Volume I, Tab 1, Cover Letter and Tab 4 Past Experience.

label: Quotation preparation in accordance with instructions
quote: Quotations must be prepared in accordance with these instructions and provide all required information in the format specified.

label: Sufficient details for evaluation
quote: The Quoter is responsible for including sufficient details to permit a complete and accurate evaluation of the quotation.

label: Page/Slide limit enforcement
quote: Pages/Slides in excess of the maximum will be removed from the end of the quotation volume by the Contracting Officer without being evaluated.

label: No classified information
quote: No classified information shall be included in the Quoter's written quotation.

label: Proprietary information marking
quote: Proprietary information shall be clearly marked.

label: Quotes/Presentations clarity and detail
quote: Quotes/Presentations must be clear, coherent, and prepared in sufficient detail for effective evaluation.

label: Quotes/Presentations rationale and substantiation
quote: Quotes/Presentations must include convincing rationale and substantiation of all claims.

label: No assumption of prior knowledge by Government
quote: Quoters shall assume that the Government has no prior knowledge of their experience and will base its evaluation on the information presented in the Quoter's quote.

label: Minimum quote acceptance period
quote: The Government requires a minimum acceptance period of at least 90 calendar days from the quote due date.
